name: places/ChIJsbmmq3FZwokRj9-O1NGS5KQ
formattedAddress: 1603 York Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1603 York Ave, New York, NY 10028-6238, USA

originalText.text:
Our experience with DogsCatsNYC has been nothing short of exceptional! The moment we walk in, Ariel, Carlos and the entire staff's warmth and enthusiasm are infectious. They treat our dog like one of their own, and it's evident they genuinely love what they do. The facilities are top-notch, with spacious play areas and meticulous cleanliness.

Our 75lb Labrador retriever, Hudson, is a frequent visitor to their day care, and each time, he comes home happy and exhausted. The team ensures plenty of exercise, socialization, and fun activities, which our dog absolutely loves.

Communication with Ariel, Carlos and the DogsCatsNYC team has always been flawless. They're accommodating, professional, trustworthy and always available for questions.

Hudson's eagerness to return each time is the best endorsement.

If you're seeking a dog day care (& overnight boarding when needed) where your pet will be treated like family, given ample playtime and love, and you'll have peace of mind, DogsCatsNYC is the place. We HIGHLY recommend it!

originalText.text: My dog Rufus loves Dogs Cats NYC! Ariel and the team take such good care of him and I know I can put my trust in them when he's there. I was so happy when they opened in the area. Rufus wags his tail going in and I always know he's in good hands when he visits for doggy daycare and boarding. He's a large dog and they're easily able to manage him on walks and make sure he's receiving the highest level of care. I highly recommend Dogs Cats NYC's services for your pet!

originalText.text: My dog and I love Dogs Cats NYC! I know when I bring her there she is in good hands. She is always so excited to go! I have brought her there for grooming, day care, and boarding. When she goes for grooming she always comes back smelling so good and with a cute bow. At day care she cuddles with the other small dogs. This is truly a gem in the neighborhood and I can’t recommend it enough!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dogs Cats NYC. My dog loves going there for daycare and boarding. She literally runs there when she is around the corner. Ariel & Carlos are the best and I trust them with my dog when I am at the office or traveling. I really like that they separate the big and little dogs. Definitely take your dog here!!

originalText.text: Carlos and Ariel have known our golden doodle Chance since he was 10 weeks old and have taken the best care of him for over 4 years now on the UES.  They are the only place we go for haircuts and grooming as well as for day care or overnight stays (have done long trips too). Prices are great, service is amazing with pickup and drop off when needed and Chance is always excited to go in there.  Have recommended to all pet owners we know in the area and always hear of similar great experiences. Very glad to have them in the area in their new beautiful location!
